item.title: Contrastive Search might-not-be What You Need
item.author: 152334H
item.description:
TL;DR

  • GPT-NeoX-20B appears to be anisotropic (Isotropy: 0.197)
  • Int8 quantisation appears to have ~no effect on isotropy
  • I am new to ML so the above could be false
